text: Terrible job tonight! Our pizzas and wings barely have any sauce. The personal pan pizza was supposed to have BBQ sauce on it. Instead, it barely had any regular pizza sauce on it. The boneless wings were just like breaded chicken nuggets. â€¦More

text: This location is so hit or miss. Sometimes my pizza is perfect and I'm happy. But other times it's downright terrible and unacceptable. text: Ordered food, took an hour and our large pizza was cold and the pizza box had taken all the cheese off and we were missing a personal pan.
